solution_line_template: First find the height of the bone meal plant: {control_plant_height} inches * {bone_meal_percent_num}% = <<{control_plant_height}*{bone_meal_percent_num}*{percent_factor}={bone_meal_plant_height}>>{bone_meal_plant_height} inches

Then find the height of the cow manure plant: {bone_meal_plant_height} inches * {cow_manure_percent_num}% = <<{bone_meal_plant_height}*{cow_manure_percent_num}*{percent_factor}={cow_manure_plant_height}>>{cow_manure_plant_height} inches
